Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1982...
Traded from San Francisco to Baltimore on 7/31/1982 (Going to SF: 1B B. Horner. Going to BAL: 3B H. Matsunaga, CF M. Jordan)...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1989, off Tommy Boggs (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/20/1989, off Bob Owchinko (CLE)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/1990, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
